connector.description: Send message to an AWS Kinesis Firehose Stream

camel.kamelet.aws-kinesis-firehose-sink..description: The name of the stream we want to send to data to

camel.kamelet.aws-kinesis-firehose-sink..description: The access key obtained from AWS

camel.kamelet.aws-kinesis-firehose-sink..description: The secret key obtained from AWS

camel.kamelet.aws-kinesis-firehose-sink..description: The AWS region to connect to Example: eu-west-1
